about_the_game:
An arcade, round-based, zombie survival FPS experience playable by yourself or with up to 3 of your friends online! Dive your way through thousands of dead bodies as you kill them to collect money to upgrade yourself by purchasing weapons, perks, upgrades & much more.

  • A round-based zombie shooter inspired by classics

  • Play by yourself or up to 4-players online

  • A Complete Experience without Microtransactions/DLCs

  • 8 Maps at Launch

  • 35+ Weapons to use & Upgrade

  • Perks & PowerUps

  • Hidden Secrets (Easter Eggs)

  • Infinite Replayability

SOLO OR WITH FRIENDS

Designed for up to 4-players online, the difficulty of BRAINDEAD scales automatically to the number of survivors in the lobby. Make sure to join our Official Discord to find teammates with the same goals as you to play with!

CLASSIC ENEMIES

Zombies & hellhounds aren't the only ones haunting the world. Progress into the rounds to awaken powerful elites and defeat them with everything you have!

GUNS & PERKS

Customize your loadout by purchasing guns & perks during the match. You can also unlock the PowerPuncher3000 and upgrade your weapons to blast enemies' heads with special laser-type enhanced bullets.

POWERUPS

Randomly spawning from killing any enemy types, powerups empower every survivor with a major advantage for a limited time or can even grant a permanent reward such as a random perk or money!

LUCKY OR NOT?

If you have some extra money and you're feeling lucky, pay a visit to the mystery box and see what comes out of it!

name: BRAINDEAD
short_description: An arcade round-based zombie survival FPS experience playable by yourself or with up to 3 of your friends online! Dive your way through thousands of dead bodies as you kill them to collect money to upgrade yourself and discover the hidden secrets of BRAINDEAD.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
